DataElement.preferredName: Hepatic Parenchyma Metastasis Negation Present Eligibility Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to cancer that has not spread to the tissue that constitutes the essential part of the liver.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to cancer that has not spread to the tissue that constitutes the essential part of the liver.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Refers to the liver.:The tissue that constitutes the essential part of an organ as contrasted with e.g., connective tissue and blood vessels.:Cancer that has spread from the organ in which it first appeared to another organ. For example, breast cancer cells may spread (metastasize) to the lungs and cause the growth of a new tumor. When this happens, the disease is called metastatic breast cancer.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to, affecting, or associated with the liver.
The tissue that constitutes the essential part of an organ as contrasted with e.g., connective tissue and blood vessels.

The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
